## DesignSystemProvider.registerCSSCustomProperty() method

Register a CSSCustomPropertyDefinition with the design system provider. Registering a CSSCustomPropertyDefinition will create the CSS custom property.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
registerCSSCustomProperty(behavior: CSSCustomPropertyDefinition): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  behavior | [CSSCustomPropertyDefinition](./fast-foundation.csscustompropertydefinition.md) |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
